ygData.subject: Re: SoW vs. Accelerando conflict
ygData.messageBody:
Doh! Of course.

-Juke

>From: Ronnie Roads <rkroads@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] SoW vs. Accelerando conflict
>Date: Wed, 1 Sep 1999 14:59:18 -0700 (PDT)
>
>From: Ronnie Roads <rkroads@...>
>
>Use Alenia's Disenchanting Melody to cancel?
>
>--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
> > From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
> >
> > At 07:23 PM 9/1/99 +0000, "Jukeboxie the Bard"
> > <jukeboxie@...> wrote:
> >
> > <snip story about SoW overriding Accelerando>
> >
> > >If it's been like this for a while, sorry. It's
> > just that I seem to remember
> > >that Accelerando used to override SoW, not the
> > other way around (you would
> > >still have the SoW icon, but you'd run at
> > Accelerando speed and get the
> > >"Your feet move faster" message).
> >
> > Well, I hate to say it, and I know there's gonna be
> > a bunch more deaths as
> > a result of this, but I'm glad they implemented this
> > change. Sure, it
> > nerfs our ability to help our teammates - but these
> > are the same teammates
> > who were upset that we were overriding their SoW
> > before during emergency
> > peelouts.
> >
> > Actually, I'm not really happy about it - but I have
> > a feeling it's a
> > nerf-to-stay.
> >
> > Talies the Wanderer
> >
>
